name: Gmail: Fix Message Sneak Peek & Multiple Inboxes
description: Fix Gmail: if you have enabled 'Multiple Inboxes' at the right side, the 'Message Sneak Peek' window becomes too small and thus unusable. This user style solves this by providing a static size and left-alignment.
additional_info:
Tested in Firefox 3.6 on 29 May 2011.

Minor update on 29 May 2011: 
Limit this user style to http://mail.google.com/mail/ or https://mail.google.com/mail/ instead of the domain google.com
